full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS KYI ZHABS KYIS MDZAD PAS 'BUM BSANGS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @036A *, ,CES 'BUM LAS BSANGS BEE t'URYA'I SNON MO BKRA SHIS 'DOD PA'I RE SKONGS 'DI NI, RJE KHRI SRONG LDE'U BTZAN RGYAL PO'I SKABS SU SLOB DPON CHEN PO PADMA K'A RA'I ZHABS KYIS, ,DPAL BSAM YAS KYI GTZUG LAG KHANG BZHENGS PA'I CHE, ,LHA SRIN SDE BRGYAD LA SOGS PA NAG PHYOGS RNAMS KYI 'DUS PA'I CHED DU MDZAD PA, DE'I RJES SU GANGS CAN BOD GYIS LA NAD RIMS DANG DAL YAMS SANG SER BTZA' MU GE THAN PA LA SOGS PA BYUNG BA'I DUS SU, DE DGRA THAMS CAD GYI ZHI BAR BYED PA'I THABS 'DI SHIN TU MCHOG GO ZER BA SNGAGS CHANG PAD DKAR 'DZAN PAS YAS GONG BZHIN MDZAD PA, DE'I RJES SU SNYIGS LNGA BDO'I DUS SU LHA 'DRE MI GSUM 'KHON 'DZIN 'THAB RTZOD KYIS SA PHYOGS YUL KHAMS THAMS CAD LO @036B CHAR CHU DUS SU MA 'BAB PA DANG, LO PHYUGS MA LEGS PA DANG RTZVA SHING CHU GSUM 'DZOM MED PA DANG, NAD RIMS TSAD LA SOGS BA LTAS NGAN PA MTSAN MA GYUR BA LA, BTZUN PA 'JAM DBYANGS DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYI YAR KLUNGS KYI STOD LA 'DI DAG GIS ZHI BAR BYED PA'I THABS 'DI MCHOG GO SNYAM PA'I LHAN THABS SU MDZAD PA'I CHO GA BZHIN DU PHYOGS PHYOGS SU 'BUM BSANGS 'DI BTANG MA THAG TU BKRA SHIS PA'I DGE LTAS MANG DU GYUR BA LA, ,MI LA SOGS PA 'GRO BA RNAMS KYI DBUL PHONGS KYI SDUG BSNGAL SEL BA DANG, PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO'I BDE SKYID LDAN PAS TSE SROG DBANG THANG BSOD RNAMS 'PHEL BAR 'GYUR RO, SMRAS PA, ,'JAM DBYANGS MGRIN 'KHYUNG MKHA' PA'I DBANG, BRTZE CHEN PHYAG NA BAD DKAR TSUL, MTHU
